title: Questions about Internship for 4th sem CSE students
content:
I am a 4th sem CSE student .My current cgpa is 9.25 .I m interested in AI or ML domain (and yet to discover cybersec as well in the near future) maybe interested to pursue MS in the future, but still unsure. Hence want to keep the option of MS open for a few more days. I want to do an internship during the summer after 4th sem. and i have the following questions . Please keep in mind i want to keep job placements and MS both as my priority parallely.   
  
1) Which one would be better to be done now? 

\* Summer college internship(like a research type of internship in labs like cdsaml) 

OR  \*Outside industrial internship(either through linked in or through some sort of a connection)? 

Or Freelancing offered in a diff domain altogether which im disinterested in(mern stack freelancing)   


2) If at all you suggest i shd do both research internship and industrial company internship then, which order would be preferred? 2nd yr reasearch and 3rd yr industry   
or 2nd yr industry 3rd yr research 

3) Which College internships are genuinly worthy and which profesoors should i be working under to get a good publication during summer internship?

comments.body: Make a single post. Not 3 different posts about the same topic.
On what basis will they shortlist for online assessment(hacker rank)? If it's a gpa what would be the cutoff?
